description:
The Oak & Anchor Hotel in Port Fairy provides adults-only accommodations with a restaurant, a bar and a garden. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Pea Soup Beach is less than 0.6 mi away.

All guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Guest rooms include a private bathroom, bathrobes and bed linen.

√† la carte and vegetarian breakfast options are available daily at The Oak & Anchor Hotel.

The nearest airport is Portland Airport, 42 mi from the accommodations.
